name: Death Trooper
flavor: Krennic's personal guard, they defend their commander with extreme prejudice.
label: Death Trooper

name: FN-2199
subtitle: Loyal Trooper
text: After you play a weapon on this character, roll that weapon die, if able. You may immediately resolve it.
label: FN-2199 - Loyal Trooper

name: Director Krennic
subtitle: Cruel but Brilliant
text: After you activate this character, if you control the battlefield, roll a Death Trooper ([SoR]1) die into your pool. Set aside that die after it is resolved or removed.
label: Director Krennic - Cruel but Brilliant

name: TIE Pilot
text: While this die is in your pool, your other dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) cannot be removed by an opponent.
label: TIE Pilot

name: E-Web Emplacement
text: While you control the battlefield, the value of each of this die's sides is increased by 1.
label: E-Web Emplacement

name: Imperial Discipline
text: Red character only. Action - Remove this die to turn one of this character's character or upgrade dice to a side showing ranged damage ([ranged]) or a resource ([resource]).
label: Imperial Discipline

name: DT-29 Heavy Blaster Pistol
text: [special] - Remove an opponent's die showing a resource cost.
label: DT-29 Heavy Blaster Pistol

name: Z6 Riot Control Baton
text:
Redeploy.
After you roll this die into your pool, you may reroll it.
label: Z6 Riot Control Baton

name: Asajj Ventress
subtitle: Force Assassin
text: After an opponent discards a card from their hand to reroll dice, you may force them to choose and discard another card from their hand.
flavor: "Your weakness will not be my downfall!"
label: Asajj Ventress - Force Assassin

name: Darth Vader
subtitle: Dark Apprentice
text: [special] - Deal 3 damage to a character. Then deal 1 damage to this character.
label: Darth Vader - Dark Apprentice

name: Palpatine
subtitle: Galactic Emperor
text: After you resolve this die, force an opponent to deal 2 damage to their characters, distributed as they wish.
flavor: "Everything is proceeding as I have foreseen."
label: Palpatine - Galactic Emperor

name: Royal Guard
text: Guardian. You cannot play Blue abilities on this character.
label: Royal Guard

name: Command Shuttle
text: [special] - Use a special ability ([special]) on one of your characters.
label: Command Shuttle

name: Force Lightning
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Deal 1 damage to a character. You  may remove a die showing a blank ([blank]) to reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.
label: Force Lightning

name: Lightsaber Pike
text: Action - Remove this die to give a non-attached character 1 shield.
label: Lightsaber Pike

name: Lure of Power
text: You may resolve the modifier sides (sides with a +) of this die to modify any symbol.
label: Lure of Power

name: Interrogation Droid
text: After you activate this support, look at a random card in an opponent's hand. If that card is an event, you may remove this die to discard it.
label: Interrogation Droid

name: Aurra Sing
subtitle: Deadly Shot
text: Before you resolve this die, you may discard a card from your hand you increase its value by 1.
label: Aurra Sing - Deadly Shot

name: Guavian Enforcer
text: Action - Remove this die to remove 1 shield from a character.
label: Guavian Enforcer

name: IG-88
subtitle: Assassin Droid
text: [special] - Play a Yellow weapon or equipment from your discard pile on this character, decreasing its cost by 2.
label: IG-88 - Assassin Droid

name: Unkar Plutt
subtitle: Junk Dealer
text: Action - Remove any number of your dice showing a combined value of 3 or more. Then discard a random card from an opponent's hand and gain resources equal to its cost.
label: Unkar Plutt - Junk Dealer

name: Slave I
text: [special] - Force an opponent to deal damage to their characters equal to the number of dice in their dice pool, distributed as they wish.
label: Slave I

name: Blackmail
text: After you roll this die, any opponent may give you 1 resource to remove this die.
label: Blackmail

name: Personal Shield
text: Before attached character is dealt 2 or more ranged damage ([ranged]), you may exhaust this upgrade to give attached character 1 shield.
label: Personal Shield

name: Vibroknucklers
text:
Ambush.
Before resolving this die, you  may spend 1 resource to increase its value by 1.
label: Vibroknucklers

name: Baze Malbus
subtitle: Crack Shot
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage to each of an opponent's characters.
label: Baze Malbus - Crack Shot

name: Mon Mothma
subtitle: Skilled Politician
text: After you play an event, you may reroll a die of the same color as that event.
label: Mon Mothma - Skilled Politician

name: Rebel Commando
text: [special] - Remove an opponent's die.
label: Rebel Commando

name: Temmin "Snap" Wexley
subtitle: Recon Specialist
text: While at least one of this die is in your pool, your opponent must spend 1 resource in order to claim the battlefield.
label: Temmin "Snap" Wexley - Recon Specialist

name: C-3PO
text: Action - Remove this die to resolve one of your dice as if it were showing a different symbol (it keeps its original value).
label: C-3PO

name: U-Wing
text:
[special] - Deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters.
[special] - Give each of your characters 2 shields.
label: U-Wing

name: A180 Blaster
text:
[special] - Deal 1 damage to a character and give attached character 1 shield.
[special] - Deal 1 damage to each of an opponent's characters.
[special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
label: A180 Blaster

name: Overkill
flavor: The most hardened soldiers already know they're dead.
label: Overkill

name: Jedi Acolyte
text: Before you resolve this die, increase its value by 1, if it is showing the same symbol as one of your other dice.
label: Jedi Acolyte

name: Chirrut Îmwe
subtitle: Blind Warrior
text: You cannot play Blue abilities on this character. After you activate this character, you may reroll all of your dice showing blanks ([blank]).
label: Chirrut Îmwe - Blind Warrior

name: Luminara Unduli
subtitle: Inspiring Commander
text: [special] - Resolve one of your character dice, increasing its value by 2, or by 3 instead if it is a non-unique character die.
label: Luminara Unduli - Inspiring Commander

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
subtitle: Mysterious Hermit
text:
Guardian.
Before this character is defeated, you may play a Blue card from your hand or discard pile for free.
label: Obi-Wan Kenobi - Mysterious Hermit

name: Delta-7 Interceptor
text: [special] - Reroll up to 3 dices (yours and/or your opponent's).
flavor: A favorite of the Jedi during the Clone Wars.
label: Delta-7 Interceptor

name: Handcrafted Light Bow
text:
[special] - Deal 3 damage to a character.
[special] - Remove all shields from a character. Then deal 2 damage to that character.
label: Handcrafted Light Bow

name: Force Heal
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Heal 1 damage from a character or spend 1 resource to heal 2 damage from a character.
label: Force Heal

name: Journals of Ben Kenobi
text: Action - Remove this die to draw a card.
label: Journals of Ben Kenobi

name: R2-D2
text: [special] - Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1.
flavor: "That little droid and I have been through a lot together." <cite>Luke Skywalker</cite>
label: R2-D2

name: Chewbacca
subtitle: Loyal Friend
text: [special] - Turn a opponent's die to a side showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]) to deal that damage to a character.
label: Chewbacca - Loyal Friend

name: Jyn Erso
subtitle: Reckless Operative
text: The cost of the first Yellow event you play each round is decreased by 1.
label: Jyn Erso - Reckless Operative

name: Maz Kanata
subtitle: Pirate Queen
text: After you activate this character, you may resolve up to 2 of your dice.
flavor: If you live long enough, you see the same eyes in different people.
label: Maz Kanata - Pirate Queen

name: Outer Rim Smuggler
text: The first time each round you play the last card from your hand, gain 1 resource.
label: Outer Rim Smuggler

name: Smuggling Freighter
text: After you resolve one of this die's sides showing a value of 2, place this support on the top of your deck.
label: Smuggling Freighter

name: Bowcaster
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Deal 1 unblockable damage each to up to 2 different characters.
label: Bowcaster

name: Lone Operative
text: [special] - Heal 2 damage from attached character, or 3 damage instead if attached character is your only character in play.
label: Lone Operative

name: Maz's Goggles
text:
To play, spot a Yellow character.
[special] - Look at an opponent's hand and discard an event from it.
label: Maz's Goggles

name: Supply Line
text: [special] - Reroll any number of your dice.
label: Supply Line

name: Astromech
text: Action - Remove this die to turn a vehicle die to any side.
label: Astromech

name: Rocket Launcher
text: [special] - Discard a vehicle from play. [special] - Deal 2 damage each to up to 2 different characters.
label: Rocket Launcher

name: Force Push
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Turn up to 2 of an opponent's dice to sides of your choice.
label: Force Push

name: Force Speed
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Take up to 2 additional actions.
label: Force Speed

name: Makashi Training
text: To play, spot a Blue character. Action - Remove one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]) and exhaust this upgrade to remove a die showing melee damage ([melee]).
label: Makashi Training

name: Vibroknife
text:
Ambush.
Damage dealt by this die or by dice it modifies is unblockable.
label: Vibroknife

name: Quadjumper
text: Action - Discard this support to play a support from your hand, decreasing its cost by 3.
label: Quadjumper

name: Ascension Gun
text: [special] - Use the ability on a battlefield that is not being used (but was brought to the game) as if you had just claimed it.
label: Ascension Gun

name: Con Artist
text:
Yellow character only.
[special] - Place 1 damage on this upgrade. Then discard cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the amount of damage on this upgrade.
label: Con Artist

name: Battle Formation
text:
Ambush.
Count the number of Red characters you have. You may reroll that many of your dice.
label: Battle Formation

name: Imperial War Machine
text: Resolve one of your Red dice showing a resource cost for free.
label: Imperial War Machine

name: Lockdown
text: Ambush. Spot two Red characters to take control of the battlefield. (This does not claim the battlefield.)
label: Lockdown

name: Sustained Fire
text:
Play only if you have 2 or more dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
Remove all shields from all of an opponent's characters.
label: Sustained Fire

name: Traitor!
text:
Ambush.
Discard the top card of your deck. Then remove a die not showing a special ([special]) that has a value equal to or less than the cost of the card you just discarded.
label: Traitor!

name: Trench Warfare
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a shield ([shield]).
Turn any number of an opponent's dice to sides showing shields ([shield]).
label: Trench Warfare

name: Undying Loyalty
text: Heal 1 damage from a Red character. If there is another copy of this event in your discard pile, you may spend 1 resource to place this event on the top of your deck instead of discarding it.
label: Undying Loyalty

name: We Have Them Now
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Turn up to 4 of your dice to sides showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: We Have Them Now

name: Attrition
text: After one of your characters is defeated, deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Attrition

name: Imperial Inspection
text: After one of your dice rolls a disrupt ([disrupt]), you may set this support aside to return an upgrade in play that costs 2 or less to its owner's hand.
label: Imperial Inspection

name: Anger
text:
Play only if you have 2 or more dice showing blanks ([blank]).
Resolve an opponent's die showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]) as if it were your die.
label: Anger

name: Lightsaber Throw
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing melee damage ([melee]).
Deal 2 damage to a character.
label: Lightsaber Throw

name: Manipulate
text: Turn one of your dice to a side showing a blank ([blank]). Then turn an opponent's die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Manipulate

name: No Disintegrations
text: Discard the top card of an opponent's deck, or 3 cards instead if there is another copy of this event in your discard pile.
label: No Disintegrations

name: Now You Will Die
text: Resolve one of your dice as if it were showing melee damage ([melee]) (it keeps its original value).
label: Now You Will Die

name: Rise Again
text: Heal 5 damage from a unique Blue character. You may play an upgrade from your discard pile on it for free.
label: Rise Again

name: The Price of Failure
text: Spot a Blue character and defeat one of your characters to ready a character.
label: The Price of Failure

name: Dark Presence
text: After one of your dice rolls a discard ([discard]), you may exhaust this support to force an opponent to choose and remove one of their dice.
label: Dark Presence

name: Now I Am The Master
text: After attached character's character or upgrade dice deal damage, you may exhaust this upgrade to turn a die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Now I Am The Master

name: Doubt
text: Reroll an opponent's die. Then that opponent either resolves that die or removes it.
label: Doubt

name: Arms Deal
text: Discard any number of weapons from your hand. Then gain 1 resource for each card you just discarded.
label: Arms Deal

name: Bait and Switch
text:
Ambush.
Turn one of your dice showing a resource ([resource]) to any side.
label: Bait and Switch

name: Friends in High Places
text:
Play only if you have dice showing a combined value of 7 or more.
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may play one of those cards for free. Discard the cards you don't play.
label: Friends in High Places

name: Loose Ends
text:
Ambush.
Remove one of your dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) to discard the top 4 cards of an opponent's deck.
label: Loose Ends

name: One-Quarter Portion
text: Remove an opponenet's die. Then that opponent gains 1 resource.
label: One-Quarter Portion

name: Relentless Pursuit
text: Move up to 2 damage from an opponent's character to another character (this ignores shields.)
label: Relentless Pursuit

name: Scrap Buy
text: Play only if you have 3 or more cards in your discard pile. Add a random card from your discard pile to your hand (show the card to your opponents).
label: Scrap Buy

name: Salvage Stand
text: After one of your dice rolls a resource ([resource]), you may exhaust this support to force an opponent to lose 1 resource.
label: Salvage Stand

name: Armor Plating
text: Before attached character takes damage, you may block up to 2 damage. Then discard this upgrade from play.
label: Armor Plating

name: Emergency Evacuation
text: Remove all dice.
label: Emergency Evacuation

name: Friendly Fire
text: Spot a Red character and remove an opponent's dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) to deal that damage to a character.
label: Friendly Fire

name: Guerrilla Warfare
text:
Ambush.
Remove one of your Red dice to deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Guerrilla Warfare

name: Our Only Hope
text: Draw a card. You may play that card for free or discard that card to gain 2 resources.
label: Our Only Hope

name: Rebel Assault
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
Remove an opponent's die not showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: Rebel Assault

name: Sensor Placement
text: Spot a red character to resolve an opponent's die not showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]) as if it were your die.
label: Sensor Placement

name: Spirit of Rebellion
text: Give a character 1 shield, or 2 shields instead if there is another copy of this event in your discard pile.
label: Spirit of Rebellion

name: Planetary Uprising
text: After you claim the battlefield, force an opponent to deal 2 damage to their characters, distributed as they wish.
label: Planetary Uprising

name: Spy Net
text: After one of your dice rolls a focus ([focus]), you may exhaust this support to discard the top card of an opponent's deck.
label: Spy Net

name: Tactical Aptitude
text: After you activate attached character, you may draw a card. Then place a card form your hand on the bottom of your deck.
label: Tactical Aptitude

name: Caution
text: Remove one of your character dice to give another character 3 shields.
label: Caution

name: Destiny
text: Remove any number of your Blue dice. Play a card from your hand for free that costs equal to or less than the combined value of the Blue dice you just removed.
label: Destiny

name: Determination
text: Play only if you have one or more dice showing a focus ([focus]). Resolve one of your dice as if it was showing a different symbol (it keeps its original value)
label: Determination

name: Guard
text: Remove one of your Blue dice showing melee damage ([melee]) to remove a number of an opponent's dice equal to the value of the die you just removed.
label: Guard

name: Krayt Dragon Howl
text: Spot a Blue character to choose an opponent's die. That opponent chooses to either remove that die or discard the top 2 cards of their deck.
label: Krayt Dragon Howl

name: My Ally Is The Force
text:
Ambush.
Resolve one of your Blue dice without removing it from your pool.
label: My Ally Is The Force

name: Synchronicity
text:
Play only if you have dice showing melee damage ([melee]) and shields ([shield]).
Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
label: Synchronicity

name: Your Eyes Can Deceive You
text: After one of your dice rolls a shield ([shield]), you may exhaust this support to turn an opponent's die to any side.
label: Your Eyes Can Deceive You

name: Protective Mentor
text: Attached character's shields can be used to block damage dealt to any character.
label: Protective Mentor

name: Confidence
text: Choose an opponent's die and force them to resolve it, if able.
label: Confidence

name: Garbage'll Do
text: Ambush. Remove one of your vehicle dice to give each of your characters 1 shield.
label: Garbage'll Do

name: Hold On!
text:
Ambush.
Move any number of shields from one of your character to another character.
label: Hold On!

name: Rebel
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a discard.
Play a card from your discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Rebel

name: Long Con
text: Gain 1 resource for each other copy of this event in your discard pile.
label: Long Con

name: Loth-Cat and Mouse
text: Force an opponent to choose and remove one of your dice. Then remove one of their dice.
label: Loth-Cat and Mouse

name: Never Tell Me The Odds
text: Choose one of your Yellow characters. Turn any number of its character and upgrade dice to sides of your choice.
label: Never Tell Me The Odds

name: Planned Explosion
text:
Play only if you have dice showing a combined value of 10 or more.
Remove all of your dice and deal 10 damage to a character.
label: Planned Explosion

name: Double-Dealing
text: After one of your dice rolls a special ([special]), you may exhaust this support to gain 1 resource.
label: Double-Dealing

name: Life Debt
text: Yellow character only. After you activate this character, you may move 1 damage from another character to this character (this ignores shields).
label: Life Debt

name: Bombing Run
text: Resolve one of your Red dice showing a disrupt ([disrupt]). Then deal 1 damage to each of an opponent's characters.
label: Bombing Run

name: Collateral Damage
text: Resolve one or more of your dice showing either melee damage ([melee]) or ranged damage ([ranged]). Then force an opponent to lose 1 resource.
label: Collateral Damage

name: Salvo
text: Resolve one of your dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) against each of an opponent's characters.
label: Salvo

name: Suppression
text: Remove one of your Red dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]). Then remove an opponent's die.
label: Suppression

name: Aftermath
text: After a character is defeated, gain 1 resource.
label: Aftermath

name: Air Superiority
text: After you play this support, place 3 shields on it. Action - Exhaust this support to move 1 shield from it to a character.
label: Air Superiority

name: Training
text: Non-unique Red character only. Attached character is elite (place a second copy of its die on its card).
label: Training

name: Wingman
text:
Red character only.
After you activate a Red character, you may activate attached character.
label: Wingman

name: Decisive Blow
text: Resolve one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]). Then remove all character and upgrade dice of the character you just dealt damage to.
label: Decisive Blow

name: High Ground
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Remove an opponent's die showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]). Then, if it was a character die, deal 1 damage to that character.
label: High Ground

name: Momentum Shift
text: Move 1 shield from an opponent's character to one of your characters.
label: Momentum Shift

name: Overconfidence
text: Spot a Blue character to reroll 2 dice. Then remove one of those dice with the lowest value (you choose in the case of a tie).
label: Overconfidence

name: Premonitions
text: Choose one: set this card aside and stack a card from your hand on it facedown, or play the card stacked on another copy of this card for free and discard the set aside copy.
label: Premonitions

name: Rejuvenate
text: Spot a Blue character to heal 1 damage from a character.
label: Rejuvenate

name: Trust Your Instincts
text: Spot a Blue character to reroll any number of its character and upgrade dice. Then you may draw a card.
label: Trust Your Instincts

name: Meditate
text: Action - Exhaust this support and remove one of your dice showing a blank ([blank]) to turn one of your dice to a side not showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: Meditate

name: Force Illusion
text: Before attached character takes damage, you may discard cards from the top of your deck equal to that damage to block it. Then discard this upgrade from play.
label: Force Illusion

name: Evade
text: Remove a die showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
label: Evade

name: New Orders
text: Switch the battlefield with a battlefield that is not being used (but was brought to the game) and use its claim ability.
label: New Orders

name: Parry
text: Remove a die showing melee damage ([melee]).
label: Parry

name: Swiftness
text:
Ambush.
Give the next card you play this turn the Ambush keyword.
label: Swiftness

name: Resolve
text: Action - Discard a card from your hand to reroll an opponent's die.
label: Resolve

name: Ammo Belt
text: Before a weapon upgrade on attached character would be discarded by a card effect, you may discard this upgrade instead.
label: Ammo Belt

name: Bolt Hole
text: Remove one of your Yellow character dice to give that character 2 shields.
label: Bolt Hole

name: Cheat
text: Switch a card in your hand with a card in your discard pile.
label: Cheat

name: Diversion
text: Force an opponent to lose 1 resource, or 3 resources instead if there is another copy of this event in your discard pile.
label: Diversion

name: "Fair" Trade
text: Resolve one of your dice showing a resource ([resource]). Then switch all of your resources with all of an opponent's resources.
label: "Fair" Trade

name: Friends in Low Places
text: Spot a Yellow character to look at an opponent's hand and discard an event from it that costs 1 or less.
label: Friends in Low Places

name: Sabotage
text: Discard cards from your hand equal to the cost of a support in play to discard that support.
label: Sabotage

name: Improvisation
text: Ambush. Action - Remove one of your dice showing a blank ([blank]) to reroll any number of your dice.
label: Improvisation

name: Outmaneuver
text: After you claim the battlefield, gain 1 resource.
label: Outmaneuver

name: Fast Hands
text:
Yellow character only.
After you activate attached character, you may resolve one of its character or upgrade dice.
label: Fast Hands

name: Carbon-freezing Chamber
subtitle: Bespin
text: Claim - Choose a character die. That die cannot be rolled during the next round.
label: Carbon-freezing Chamber - Bespin

name: Cargo Hold
subtitle: Eravana
text: Claim - Move an upgrade from a character to another character controlled by the same player.
label: Cargo Hold - Eravana

name: Docking Bay
subtitle: Finalizer
text: Claim - Play a support from your hand or discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Docking Bay - Finalizer

name: Ewok Village
subtitle: Endor
text: Claim - Remove all shields from a character.
label: Ewok Village - Endor

name: Maz's Castle
subtitle: Takodana
text: Claim - Draw 2 cards. Place any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck (in any order).
label: Maz's Castle - Takodana

name: Moisture Farm
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Claim - Gain 1 resource.
label: Moisture Farm - Tatooine

name: Otoh Gunga
subtitle: Naboo
text: Claim - Heal 1 damage from a character.
label: Otoh Gunga - Naboo

name: Secluded Beach
subtitle: Scarif
text: Claim - Remove an opponent's die showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
label: Secluded Beach - Scarif

name: Secret Facility
subtitle: Scarif
text: Claim - Resolve up to 3 of your dice showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: Secret Facility - Scarif

name: War-Torn Streets
subtitle: Jedha
text: Claim - Discard a random card from an opponent's hand.
label: War-Torn Streets - Jedha
